Summary: seen ufo come from the clouds.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was out filming the lightning and strikes then i seen a white light come from in the clouds and i filmed it as it went into a straigt line toward the direction of san bernardino east of my location. At the same time i took a picture of it with my digital camera.When it came from within the clouds it like shot out fast toward the ground and it leveled out it went slow.I filmed until it dissapeared.I felt excited and showed my family.
